scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd dist && git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy' && git branch -M gh-pages && (git remote add origin https://github.com/d3nnis2001/AutoProd-Landing-Page.git 2>/dev/null || git remote set-url origin https://github.com/d3nnis2001/AutoProd-Landing-Page.git) && git push -f origin gh-pages && cd .. && rm -rf dist/.git
